name: Fidelity-Philadelphia Trust Company, Trustee, v. Bergson, Appellant

judges: Before Schaffer, Maxet, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Fidelity-Philadelphia Trust Company, Trustee, v. Bergson, Appellant

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Linn,
This appeal to No. 317 is like No. 201; for the reasons there stated the judgment is affirmed and the record is remitted with leave to proceed for the balance.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Linn,

attorneys: Joseph First, with him Murdoch, Paxson, Kalish & Green, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Fidelity-Philadelphia Trust Company, Trustee, v. Bergson, Appellant
(No. 2).
Argued November 26, 1937.
Before Schaffer, Maxet, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Walter B. Gibbons, for appellant.
Joseph First, with him Murdoch, Paxson, Kalish & Green, for appellee.
January 3, 1938:
